channel.title: RuNeStUfF[]Server Coder + Hoster Needed![]
channel.description:
[center][b]~~RuNeStUfF~~[/b][/center]
[center][b]RuneStuff are starting fresh, a whole new oppertunity. The last server was a great success, and the new era is coming. RuneStuffV2. ALLWAYS READ THE BITS IN BOLD, THEY'RE IMPORTANT[/b][/center]
[b][u]The Aim Of RST[/u][/b]
[i]I'm wishing to provide fun in the PServer Community. By making a server with a dedicated team of coders, Since im only in charge, Coders will be Co-Owners, so its fair to everyone, because TBH All server owners do is bark orders at people and take the credits for the whole server. It will be [b]different[/b] here...[/i] [hr]
[b][u]Server Base[/u][/b]
[i]Ok, if we make a server we need a base. A good base. A crossed PK, And Regular Roll Playing base. We dont know what source as of yet.. My coders should aim to Enhance the gameplay of [SOURCE] and make it better than it already is.[b]We need a server removed of ALL bad language, any bad language that is there and is not removed when i tell the coder to, they will be fired.[/b][/i] [hr]
[b][u]Client Base[/u][/b]
[i]Im kinda' looking for something with a 417 GameFrame, with a RuneStuff logo background and so on, [b]The client will not be in affect of creation straight away, we need to get MYSQL, so it can be a WC but that will come eventually, after the serever making.[/b][/i] [hr]
[b][u]Who Im Looking For[/u][/b]
[i]Obviously the team need someone with Java experience, i dont want a Pro, because i want this to be a lecture into java. Lots of learning is to be done.[/i]
[b][u]The Current Team[/u][/b]
We need Server Coders first, this is a basic requirement before we begin work on the Client. -[b]Open[/b]
Once the server is around 65% Done, we will begin work on the client. -[i]Reggiedx1[/i]
We will obviously need a hoster, it would be easier if the hoster was the Server Coder, but that is up to them. -[b]Open[/b]
[size=12pt]Remeber:[b]Im not selfish, or mean. I am making a development team because im not allowed to make a server. Just to clarify i posted this.[/b][/size]

item.title: RuNeStUfF[]Server Coder + Hoster Needed![]
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

[center]RuNeStUfF[/center]

[center]RuneStuff are starting fresh, a whole new oppertunity. The last server was a great success, and the new era is coming. RuneStuffV2.
ALLWAYS READ THE BITS IN BOLD, THEY’RE IMPORTANT[/center]

The Aim Of RST

I’m wishing to provide fun in the PServer Community. By making a server with a dedicated team of coders, Since im only in charge, Coders will be Co-Owners, so its fair to everyone, because TBH All server owners do is bark orders at people and take the credits for the whole server. It will be different here…
[hr]

Server Base

Ok, if we make a server we need a base. A good base. A crossed PK, And Regular Roll Playing base. We dont know what source as of yet… My coders should aim to Enhance the gameplay of [SOURCE] and make it better than it already is.We need a server removed of ALL bad language, any bad language that is there and is not removed when i tell the coder to, they will be fired.
[hr]

Client Base

Im kinda’ looking for something with a 417 GameFrame, with a RuneStuff logo background and so on,
The client will not be in affect of creation straight away, we need to get MYSQL, so it can be a WC but that will come eventually, after the serever making.
[hr]

Who Im Looking For

Obviously the team need someone with Java experience, i dont want a Pro, because i want this to be a lecture into java. Lots of learning is to be done.

The Current Team

We need Server Coders first, this is a basic requirement before we begin work on the Client.
-Open

Once the server is around 65% Done, we will begin work on the client.
-Reggiedx1

We will obviously need a hoster, it would be easier if the hoster was the Server Coder, but that is up to them.
-Open

[size=12pt]Remeber:Im not selfish, or mean. I am making a development team because im not allowed to make a server. Just to clarify i posted this.[/size]

Read full topic
